title: Bimetallic metal organic framework/Ni doped ZnO nanomaterials modified carbon paste electrode for selective electrochemical determination of ciprofloxacin
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7836-7849
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08174E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Susan Sadeghi, Javad Javanshiri-Ghasemabadi
In this work, an efficient and sensitive electrochemical sensor based on Cu/Ce-MOF/NZP/CPE for the determination of ciprofloxacin (CIP) is reported.
